org.rcsb.mmtf.codec

Interface CharCodecInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CharCodecs

    public interface CharCodecInterface
    An interface all char codecs must implement
    Author:
    Anthony Bradley

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      char[] decode(byte[] inputData, int param)
      Decode a byte array to a char array.
      byte[] encode(char[] inputData, int param)
      Encode a char array to a byte array.

        char[] decode(byte[] inputData,
              int param)
        Decode a byte array to a char array.
        Parameters:

        param - the input param
        Returns:
        the decoded char array
